distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
The git package was updated to fix the following security issue:

- CVE-2015-7545: Fix remote code execution with recursive fetch of submodules (bsc#948969).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The (1) git-remote-ext and (2) unspecified other remote helper programs in Git before 2.3.10, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.x before 2.5.4, and 2.6.x before 2.6.1 do not properly restrict the allowed protocols, which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a URL in a (a) .gitmodules file or (b) unknown other sources in a submodule.
